t: High-end department store retailer Saks launches Amazon storefront | Reuters
s: 1 month ago - Saks Fifth Avenue is launching a storefront on Amazon.com where it will sell high-end, designer products from Dolce&Gabbana and Balmain in the e-commerce giant's latest foray into selling luxury goods, the companies said on Tuesday.

t: Saks opens luxury storefront on Amazon | Chain Store Age
s: 1 month ago - Saks Fifth Avenue is offering a curated assortment of fashion and beauty products in a dedicated section of the Amazon site. t: Can Amazon finally crack luxury with Saks? | Vogue Business
s: 1 month ago - A variety of fashion, makeup and skincare brands are listed in the storefront, which is part of Amazon Luxury Stores, including Stella McCartney, Balmain, Dolce & Gabbana, Fear of God, Adam Lippes, Giambattista Valli and Rebecca Vallance, most with a limited selection available to shop.
